line_2: And riots in the Bliss of Blisses.

line_1: With laughter bind, and harmless kisses;
line_2: Or such as hock-tide boys and misses
And the sweetest bliss of blisses,

line_1: Thy open mouth that offers kisses
I could give thee thousand Kisses,
COME, Chloe, and give me sweet kisses,
line_2: But why in the midst of my blisses

line_1: But the wretch that can number his kisses
line_2: What joy can be greater than this is?
